summary: A tiny house located in the swamps near Morthal.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#9fc5e8][size=5][center]Swamp House[/center][/size][/color][/b][img]https://i.imgur.com/FE87mTz.png[/img]

A tiny, Dunmer-themed house located in the swamp near Morthal. This little haven is inspired by the tiny houses [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7913946?tab=user+files]lolikyonyu[/url] made for Classic. I really wanted something small with no load screens and this is the result! There's a bed, cook pot, alchemy and enchanting stations, and a lot of storage!

[b][color=#9fc5e8][size=3]Recommended[/size][/color][/b]
[list]
[size=2][*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18162]Enhanced Landscapes[/url] Specifically the Dead Marsh optional file. My screenshots show the mushrooms around the house.
[/size][*][size=2][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807]Noble Skyrim[/url][/size]
[/list]
[b][size=3][color=#9fc5e8]Special Thanks:
[/color][/size][/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/40453140]Undriel[/url] for helping me look into an issue during testing! She's awesome. Go check out her stuff!

[b][size=3][color=#9fc5e8]Notes for Survival Users:
[/color][/size][/b]
I tried, but I couldn't seem to get the bed past drained. I'm still looking into this and there will be an update if I can figure it out. For now, the fire does give off heat so the house is warm.

[b]There will be no Classic version of this mod. Please do not ask for one.[/b]
author: Alexmancer
